name: Assassinate
story_text: A practiced attack will instantly kill an already weakened foe.
effect: A target who is not a minion, leader, or solo creature and who is winded after taking this damage is reduced to 0 Stamina.

name: Black Ash Eruption
story_text: Your attack produces a cloud of black ash that launches an enemy into the air.
effect: A creature force moved by this ability must be moved straight upward.

name: Black Ash Teleport
story_text: In a swirl of black ash, you step from one place to another.
effect:
You teleport up to 5 squares. If you have concealment or cover at your destination, you can use the Hide maneuver even if you are observed. If you successfully hide using this maneuver, you gain 1 surge.

You teleport 1 additional square for each insight spent.

name: Blackout
story_text: You cause a plume of shadow to erupt from your eyes and create a cloud of darkness.
effect: A black cloud fills the area until the end of your next turn, granting you and your allies concealment against enemies. While you are in the area, whenever an enemy ends their turn in the area, you can use a free triggered action to shift to a new location within the area and make a free strike against them.

name: Cacophony of Cinders
story_text: You tumble through the battle, stabbing foes and teleporting allies.

low.all_text: An enemy takes 6 damage; an ally can teleport up to 3 squares.

mid.all_text: An enemy takes 10 damage; an ally can teleport up to 5 squares.

high.all_text: An enemy takes 14 damage; an ally can teleport up to 7 squares.

effect: You shift up to twice your speed, making one power roll that targets each creature you come adjacent to during the shift.

name: Careful Observation
story_text: A moment of focus leaves a foe firmly in your sights.
effect: As long as you remain within distance of the target, maintain line of effect to them, and strike no other creature first, you gain an edge on the next strike you make against the assessed creature, and gain 1 surge you can use only on that strike.

name: Chain Reaction
story_text: One explosion, an offense. Three explosions, an assault. Nine explosions, a celebration.
effect: Each enemy within 3 squares of the target who is not currently targeted by this ability also becomes targeted by this ability. This effect continues until there are no more available targets. The ability deals acid, fire, or poison damage (your choice).

name: Cinderstorm
story_text: You teleport your friends in a burst of ash and fire.
targets: Self and each ally in the area
effect: Each target can teleport up to 5 squares. For each target in addition to you who teleports away from or into a space adjacent to an enemy, that enemy takes fire damage equal to your Agility score. Additionally, a target who ends this movement in concealment or cover can use the Hide maneuver even if they are observed.

name: Clever Trick
story_text: You sow a moment of confusion in combat, to your enemy's peril.
effect: Choose an enemy within distance of the triggering strike, including the enemy who targeted you. The strike targets that enemy instead.

name: Coat the Blade
story_text: A little poison goes a long way.
effect:
You gain 2 surges. Additionally, whenever you use a surge before the end of the encounter, you can choose to have it deal poison damage.

For each insight you spend, you gain 1 additional surge.

name: Coup de Grace
story_text: Your blade might be the last thing they see.

name: Dancer
story_text: You enter a flow state that makes you nearly impossible to pin down.
effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an enemy moves or is force moved adjacent to you or damages you, you can take the Disengage move action as a free triggered action.

name: Defensive Roll
story_text: When an enemy attacks, you roll with the impact to reduce the harm.
effect:
You take half the triggering damage, then can shift up to 2 squares after the triggering effect resolves. If you end this shift with concealment or cover, you can use the Hide maneuver even if you are observed.

The potency of any effects associated with the damage are reduced by 1 for you.

name: Demon Door
story_text: You create a temporary portal to allow a massive demonic hand to reach through.
effect: On a critical hit, the target is grabbed by the demon and pulled through the portal before it closes, never to be seen again.

name: Disorienting Strike
story_text: Your attack leaves them reeling, allowing you to follow up.
effect: You can shift into any square the target leaves when you slide them.

name: Eviscerate
story_text: You leave your foe bleeding out after a devastating attack.

low.all_text: 4 + A damage; R < WEAK, bleeding (save ends)

mid.all_text: 6 + A damage; R < AVERAGE, bleeding (save ends)

high.all_text: 10 + A damage; R < STRONG, bleeding (save ends)

name: Gasping in Pain
story_text: Your precise strikes let your allies take advantage of a target's agony.
effect: One ally within 5 squares of the target gains 1 surge.

name: Get In Get Out
story_text: Move unexpectedly, strike fast, and be gone!

name: Hesitation Is Weakness
story_text: Keep up the attack. Never give them a moment's grace.
effect: You take your turn after the triggering hero.

name: I Am You
story_text: Your mask reflects your foe's face. Surely they won't need it much longer.
effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the target's damage immunities and speed (if they are better than yours), and can use any types of movement they can use. You can also use the target's signature ability, using their bonus for the power roll.

name: I Work Better Alone
story_text: "It's better, just you and me. Isn't it?"
effect: If the target has none of your allies adjacent to them, you gain 1 surge before making the power roll.

name: I'm No Threat
story_text: Taking on an illusory countenance gives you an advantage on subterfuge.
effect:
You envelop yourself in an illusion that makes you appear nonthreatening and harmless to your enemies. You might take on the appearance of a harmless animal of your size, such as a sheep or capybara, or you might appear as a less heroic and unarmed version of yourself. While this illusion lasts, your strikes gain an edge, and when you take the Disengage move action, you gain a +1 bonus to the distance you can shift.
The illusion ends when you harm another creature, when you physically interact with a creature, when you use this ability again, or when you end the illusion (no action required). If you end this illusion by harming another creature, you gain 1 surge.

Choose a creature whose size is no more than 1 greater than yours and who is within 10 squares. This ability's illusion makes you appear as that creature. This illusion covers your entire body, including clothing and armor, and alters your voice to sound like that of the creature. You gain an edge on tests made to convince the creature's allies that you are the creature.

name: In All This Confusion
story_text: You vanish in a plume of black smoke to avoid danger.
effect:
You take half the damage, then can teleport up to 4 squares after the triggering effect resolves.

You teleport 1 additional square for each insight spent.

name: In a Puff of Ash
story_text: You enchant a strike with your teleportation magic.

low.all_text: 6 + A damage; you can teleport the target 1 square

mid.all_text: 10 + A damage; you can teleport the target up to 3 squares

high.all_text: 14 + A damage; you can teleport the target up to 5 squares

name: Into the Shadows
story_text: You sweep your foe off their feet and plunge them into absolute darkness.
effect: You and the target are removed from the encounter map until the start of your next turn. You reappear in the spaces you left or the nearest unoccupied spaces. Make a power roll upon your return.

name: It Was Me All Along
story_text: After everything you've been through together, you twist the blade and make the pain extra personal.
effect: If you are disguised as a creature the target knew using your I'm No Threat ability, this ability deals extra damage equal to three times your Agility score.

name: Look!
story_text: You distract your foes, allowing your allies to take advantage of that distraction.
effect: Until the start of your next turn, any ability roll made against a target gains an edge.

name: Machinations of Sound
story_text: Illusory sounds make your foes reposition themselves as they cower or investigate the disturbance.
effect: This forced movement ignores stability. Instead, the forced movement is reduced by a number equal to the target's Intuition score.

name: Misdirecting Strike
story_text: "Why are you looking at ME?!"
effect: The target is taunted by a willing ally within 5 squares of you until the end of the target's next turn.

name: Night Watch
story_text: A steely dagger from out of the blue knocks another weapon off course.
effect: The target takes half the damage. You remain hidden.

name: One Hundred Throats
story_text: As you move across the battlefield, every foe within reach feels your wrath.
effect: You shift up to your speed and make one power roll that targets up to three enemies who came adjacent to you during the move.

name: One Vial Makes You Better
story_text: A well-timed throw of a potion will keep your allies in the fight.
effect:
You ready, hand, or lob a potion to each target, who can immediately quaff the potion (no action required). If they don't drink the potion right away, they must use the Use Consumable maneuver to consume it later. The potion loses its potency at the end of the encounter.
A creature who drinks the potion can spend up to 2 Recoveries, and has acid immunity, fire immunity, or poison immunity (their choice) equal to your level until the end of the encounter.

name: One Vial Makes You Faster
story_text: Each ally who catches a potion you throw can take the battle to the next level.

low.all_text: The creature's speed is increased by 2 until the end of the encounter.

mid.all_text: The creature can fly until the end of the encounter.

high.all_text: The creature turns invisible until the end of their next turn.

effect:
You ready, hand, or lob a potion to each target, who can immediately quaff the potion (no action required). If they don't drink the potion right away, they must use the Use Consumable maneuver to consume it later. The potion loses its potency at the end of the encounter.
A creature who drinks the potion receives benefits based on your power roll.

name: Pinning Shot
story_text: One missileplaced well and placed hard.

low.all_text: 8 + A damage; A < WEAK, restrained (save ends)

mid.all_text: 12 + A damage; A < AVERAGE, restrained (save ends)

high.all_text: 16 + A damage; A < STRONG, restrained (save ends)

name: Puppet Strings
story_text: You prick little needles on the tips of your fingers into the nerves of your enemies and cause them to lose control.

low.all_text: 2 damage; if the target has R < WEAK, before the damage is resolved, they make a free strike.

mid.all_text: 5 damage; if the target has R < AVERAGE, before the damage is resolved, they use a main action ability of your choice.

high.all_text: 7 damage; if the target has R < STRONG, before the damage is resolved, they can shift up to their speed and use a main action ability of your choice.

effect: You choose the new targets for the original target's free strike or ability. Additionally, if you are hidden or disguised, using this ability doesn't cause you to be revealed.

name: Setup
story_text: Your friends will thank you.

low.all_text: 6 + A damage; R < WEAK, the target has damage weakness 5 (save ends)

mid.all_text: 9 + A damage; R < AVERAGE, the target has damage weakness 5 (save ends)

high.all_text: 13 + A damage; R < STRONG, the target has damage weakness 5 (save ends)

name: Shadowfall
story_text: You vanish. They fall. You reappear.
effect: You disappear before making the power roll. After the power roll is resolved, you appear in the first unoccupied space at the far end of the line.

name: Shadowgrasp
story_text: The shadows around you give way, allowing the shadow creature within you to grasp at your foes.

low.all_text: 11 corruption damage; A < WEAK, restrained (save ends)

mid.all_text: 16 corruption damage; A < AVERAGE, restrained (save ends)

high.all_text: 21 corruption damage; A < STRONG, restrained (save ends)

name: Shadowstrike
story_text: They have no idea what the college taught you.
effect: You use a strike signature ability twice.

name: So Gullible
story_text: When your enemy strikes, you reveal you were in a different place all along.
effect: You use your Clever Trick ability with no insight cost against the triggering creature and strike. You can teleport to an unoccupied space within 3 squares of that creature and can make a free strike against them. You can then spend a Recovery.

name: Speed of Shadows
story_text: You make multiple strikes against a foe before they even notice they're dead.
effect: You can use a strike signature ability four times, use a strike signature ability that gains an edge three times, or use a strike signature ability that has a double edge twice. You can shift up to 2 squares between each use.

name: Staggering Blow
story_text: There's no recovering from this.

low.all_text: 7 + A damage; M < WEAK, slowed (save ends)

mid.all_text: 11 + A damage; M < AVERAGE, prone and can't stand (save ends)

high.all_text: 16 + A damage; M < STRONG, prone and can't stand (save ends)

name: Sticky Bomb
story_text: Explosives are best when they're attached to an enemy.
effect: You attach a small bomb to a creature. If you are hidden from the creature, they don't notice the bomb and you remain hidden. The creature otherwise notices the bomb and can disarm and remove it as a main action. If they don't, at the end of your next turn, the bomb detonates. When the bomb detonates, you make a power roll targeting each enemy within 2 squares of it.

name: Stink Bomb
story_text: Putrid yellow gas explodes from a bomb you toss.
effect: The gas remains in the area until the end of the encounter. Any creature who starts their turn in the area and has M < AVERAGE is weakened (save ends).

name: Teamwork Has Its Place
story_text: You attack an enemy as an ally exposes their weakness.
effect: If any ally is adjacent to the target, you gain 1 surge before making the power roll.

name: They Always Line Up
story_text: You fire a projectile so fast that it passes through a line of foes, hamstringing them.

name: Time Bomb
story_text: The longer it cooks, the bigger the boom.
effect:
Each target takes acid, fire, or poison damage (your choice) equal to your Agility score.
For each combat round that has passed since this ability was last used in the current encounter, the area increases by 1 and you gain 1 surge that must be used with this ability. After using the ability or at the end of the encounter, its area and surges are reset.

For every 2 insight spent, you increase the cube's size by 1 and gain 1 surge that can be used only with this ability.

name: To the Stars
story_text: You attach your most potent explosive to your foe. Under less pressing circumstances, you're sure you could launch them into orbit.
effect: The ground beneath a 3-cube area around the target's starting position is difficult terrain.

name: Too Slow
story_text: Your foe made a big mistake.
effect: You ignore any effects associated with the damage that triggered your In All This Confusion ability. Before you teleport, you can make a free strike against a creature who damaged you to trigger In All This Confusion. After you teleport, you can spend a Recovery.

name: Two Throats at Once
story_text: A bargain.

name: You Talk Too Much
story_text: Silence is a virtue. A knife pinning their mouth shut is the next best thing.

low.all_text: 10 + A damage; P < WEAK, dazed (save ends)

mid.all_text: 15 + A damage; P < AVERAGE, dazed (save ends)

high.all_text: 21 + A damage; P < STRONG, dazed (save ends)

effect: The target can't communicate with anyone until the end of the encounter.

name: You Were Watching the Wrong One
story_text: They can't watch both of you at once.
effect: As long as you have one or more allies within 5 squares of the target, you gain 1 surge. If you are flanking the target when you use this ability, choose one ally who is flanking with you. That ally also gains 1 surge.
